评论详情: This is a decent necklace if you’re looking for something chunky and flashy. I originally got it because I wanted a nice layered necklace and I don’t mind a heavier look, but when I put it on it’s the exact type of thing I wore as a 16yr old. Not a bad thing, just not my current style :D It’s a little shorter than I expected, as well.

I was a little worried this would look cheap, but it doesn't. It is super cute and fits well. It is versatile and can be worn with just about anything. It looks great and I am very happy with it. I would recommend it to others. It would also make a wonderful gift as well.
